name: MusicBox
0:
”Alexa, tell music box to sing Happy Birthday to Taylor Swift.”
”Alexa, tell music box to sing Happy Birthday to Katy Perry.”
”Alexa, tell music box to sing Happy Birthday to Justin Timberlake.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: music box
des:
This skill makes Alexa sing a personalized Happy Birthday song. For melodic reasons, you must tell Alexa two names for the person to sing Happy Birthday to. 

For example, try: "Alexa, tell music box to sing Happy Birthday to Taylor Swift."
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
